name: FitOptions
shortdesc: Options for fitting content to a frame.

property.name: CONTENT_TO_FRAME
property.shortdesc: Resizes content to fit the frame. Note: Content that is a different size than the frame appears stretched or squeezed.

property.name: CENTER_CONTENT
property.shortdesc: Centers content in the frame; preserves the frame size as well as content size and proportions. Note: If the content is larger than the frame, content around the edges is obscured.

property.name: PROPORTIONALLY
property.shortdesc: Resizes content to fit the frame while preserving content proportions. If the content and frame have different proportions, some empty space appears in the frame.

property.name: FRAME_TO_CONTENT
property.shortdesc: Resizes the frame so it fits the content.

property.name: FILL_PROPORTIONALLY
property.shortdesc: Resizes content to fill the frame while perserving the proportions of the content. If the content and frame have different proportions, some of the content is obscured by the bounding box of the frame.

property.name: APPLY_FRAME_FITTING_OPTIONS
property.shortdesc: Applies the current frame fitting options to the frame and content.
